summary: CareerSphere - A modern responsive career guidance web platform for school and college students with 8 interactive modules including career path suggestion, stream selector, chatbot, and degree finder
architectural_notes: Modern responsive web application with mobile-first design
Design system: soft colors (blue, purple, gradient), clean typography, dashboard-style cards
8 interactive module pages: Career Path, Stream Selector, India vs Abroad, Chatbot, FutureMap, Degree Finder, plus About/Contact
Navigation structure: Home, Modules, About, Contact, Login
known_issues: Quiz results not displaying in admin panel - data persistence issue between quiz submission and admin dashboard
Deployment error occurred during canister compilation and network deployment

existing_features.title: Create a landing page with hero section displaying title 'CareerSphere' and tagline 'Empowering Students for Skills and Knowledge', navigation menu with links to Home, Modules, About, Contact, and Login, and a prominent 'Get Started' call-to-action button

Create a modules section displaying 8 interactive feature cards in a grid layout: Career Path Suggestion App, India vs Abroad Career Decision Guide, Stream Selector Tool for 10th Students, Know Your Skill AI Chatbot, FutureMap Visual Career Journey, Regional Language Career Platform, Subject-to-Career AR Explorer, and Degree Info Finder (After 12th). Each card must include an icon, short description, and 'Explore' button
Create a Career Path page with a dropdown selector for subjects/interests that displays career options, required degrees, and relevant entrance exams in a card-based layout
Create a Stream Selector Quiz page with multiple choice questions that provides a result section displaying the suggested stream (Science, Commerce, or Arts) based on user answers
Create an India vs Abroad Comparison page featuring a comparison table with columns for Cost, ROI, Lifestyle, and Job Opportunities, enhanced with graphs or visual indicators
Create a Chatbot page with a chat interface layout including message display area, message input box, and send button, designed with a student-friendly aesthetic
Create a FutureMap page displaying a visual career journey flow from School Subjects → Degree → Career → Job using a timeline or roadmap-style UI
Create a Degree Info Finder page with a search bar that displays degree information cards showing degree name, duration, entrance exams, and fees
Create an About section describing the CareerSphere platform, including the problem statement that students lack career guidance, along with the platform's mission and vision
Create a Contact page with a contact form containing fields for name, email, and message, and include a footer with social media links

Implement a modern UI design system with soft gradient colors (blue and purple), fully responsive mobile-friendly layouts, clean typography, dashboard-style components using cards, icons, and interactive buttons throughout the application
Update Stream Selector Quiz page to automatically save quiz results to the backend when user completes the quiz and is authenticated via Internet Identity
Add bookmark buttons to Career Path page cards that save selected careers to the user's profile when authenticated
Add bookmark buttons to Degree Finder page cards that save selected degrees to the user's profile when authenticated
Create a new Profile/Dashboard page accessible from the navigation menu that displays the authenticated user's saved quiz results, bookmarked careers, and bookmarked degrees
Update Login page to show authentication status and provide a clear call-to-action explaining the benefits of logging in (save progress, bookmark careers, track quiz results)

Update Navigation component to improve mobile responsiveness with proper hamburger menu functionality, touch-friendly tap targets (minimum 44px), and smooth transitions between mobile and tablet breakpoints

Enhance Home page hero section and feature cards to be fully responsive across mobile (< 768px), tablet (768px-1024px), and laptop (>1024px) screen sizes with appropriate font scaling, spacing, and card layouts
Update Modules page grid layout to display 1 column on mobile, 2 columns on tablet, and 3-4 columns on laptop with consistent card sizing and spacing across all breakpoints
Optimize CareerPath page dropdown selector, career cards, and bookmark buttons for mobile, tablet, and laptop screens with improved touch interactions and responsive card layouts
Enhance StreamSelector quiz page and StreamResult page to be fully responsive with proper question layout, button sizing, and result display across mobile, tablet, and laptop screens
Update IndiaVsAbroad comparison page to display comparison categories in responsive layout: stacked on mobile, side-by-side on tablet/laptop, with readable progress bars and text at all screen sizes
Optimize Chatbot page message interface for mobile, tablet, and laptop screens with responsive message bubbles, input area that avoids keyboard overlap on mobile, and proper scrolling behavior
Enhance FutureMap timeline visualization to be fully responsive with vertical timeline on mobile, adaptive spacing on tablet, and horizontal/branching layout on laptop screens

Update DegreeFinder search and results layout to be fully responsive with stacked cards on mobile, 2-column grid on tablet, and 3-column grid on laptop, with touch-friendly search input and bookmark buttons
Optimize About page mission/vision cards and Contact page form for mobile, tablet, and laptop screens with responsive card layouts, form field sizing, and proper spacing
Enhance Profile page layout to be fully responsive with stacked sections on mobile (principal ID, quiz results, bookmarks), adaptive grid on tablet, and multi-column dashboard layout on laptop
Update Footer component to be fully responsive with stacked social media links on mobile, horizontal layout on tablet/laptop, and appropriate icon sizing across all breakpoints
Create a new Admin Dashboard page route at /admin that displays all stored user data from the backend in a responsive table format
Implement React Query hooks for admin operations including fetching all user profiles and deleting user profiles with proper cache invalidation

Add View button functionality to Admin Dashboard that displays detailed user information in a modal or expandable section showing full quiz results, complete bookmarked careers list, and complete bookmarked degrees list
Add Delete button functionality to Admin Dashboard with confirmation dialog that removes user profiles from the backend and updates the table display
Add navigation link to Admin Dashboard in the Navigation component accessible when user is authenticated via Internet Identity
Apply responsive design to Admin Dashboard with mobile-first approach: stacked cards on mobile (<768px), table layout on tablet (768px-1024px), and full table with all columns on laptop (>1024px)
Remove Internet Identity authentication requirement from Admin Dashboard page (/admin) to allow unauthenticated access to view all stored user data
Remove role-based access control checks from AdminDashboard.tsx that currently redirect non-admin users, allowing any visitor to access the page
Update Navigation component to display Admin Dashboard link to all users, removing the authentication-dependent conditional rendering
Update frontend/src/pages/StreamSelector.tsx to add console logging when quiz is submitted, logging the submission status, response from backend, and any errors
Update frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx to add console logging for data fetching operations, logging the number of profiles received, loading states, and any fetch errors
Update frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts submitQuizResult mutation to ensure it properly calls the backend actor's submitQuizResult method and handles the response
Update frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts useAllUserProfiles query to ensure it properly calls the backend actor's getAllUserProfiles method and transforms the data for display
Remove all hardcoded references to 'CareerSphere' from frontend/index.html document title tag
Remove all hardcoded references to 'CareerSphere' from frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx hero section title and tagline
Remove all hardcoded references to 'CareerSphere' from frontend/src/pages/About.tsx page content including mission and vision statements
Search and remove any remaining references to 'CareerSphere' from all other frontend components including Navigation.tsx, ModuleCard.tsx, and all page components
Update frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx to replace the entire copyright section with the text '© 2026 CareerSphere. All Rights Reserved.'
Deploy the frontend to Internet Computer production network and generate a permanent public .ic0.app URL that works on mobile and laptop devices
Verify the production deployment persists and remains accessible 24/7 without requiring platform login

Search all remaining frontend components (Navigation.tsx, ModuleCard.tsx, Contact.tsx, Login.tsx, Profile.tsx, and all other page components) for any 'career guide' text and replace with 'CareerSphere'

new_feature_requests.summary: Landing page with hero section, navigation, and Get Started CTA
8 feature modules cards grid with icons and explore buttons
Career Path page with subject dropdown and career/degree/exam cards
Stream Selector Quiz with MCQs and result showing Science/Commerce/Arts
India vs Abroad comparison page with table and visual indicators
Chatbot page UI with chat interface and message input
FutureMap page with visual career journey timeline from subjects to job
Degree Info Finder with search bar and degree cards showing duration/exams/fees
About section with platform description, problem statement, mission and vision
Contact page with form and footer with social links
Authentication system so students can save progress and preferences

Implement backend user profile data model in main.mo to store student preferences, quiz results, saved career paths, and selected modules. Include stable storage for persistence across canister upgrades.
Add backend functions to save and retrieve Stream Selector quiz results, associating them with the authenticated user's principal ID
Add backend functions to save and retrieve bookmarked career paths and degree programs for authenticated users
Implement stable storage in backend/main.mo to ensure all user data (quiz results, bookmarked careers, bookmarked degrees, user profiles) persists across canister upgrades using stable variables
Create backend/migration.mo file with pre_upgrade and post_upgrade hooks to safely migrate existing user data during canister upgrades
Add backend validation functions to ensure data integrity for quiz results (valid stream values), career bookmarks (non-empty fields), and degree bookmarks (valid duration and fee ranges)

Implement backend error handling for all public functions in main.mo to return Result types with descriptive error messages for validation failures, authentication issues, and data not found scenarios
Add backend query function to retrieve bookmark statistics (total careers bookmarked, total degrees bookmarked, most popular bookmarks across all users) for potential analytics dashboard
Ensure fully responsive design optimized for mobile, tablet, and laptop screens across all pages
Admin Dashboard page to view stored user data in table format with view and delete actions
Add backend query function getAllUserProfiles that returns all stored user profiles with their quiz results, bookmarked careers, and bookmarked degrees for admin viewing
Add backend update function deleteUserProfile that removes a user profile and all associated data by principal ID with proper authentication checks
Update Admin Dashboard to be accessible without Internet Identity authentication

Fix quiz data not displaying in admin panel: ensure quiz submission saves to JSON database, connect admin dashboard to read from same JSON file, fix backend API endpoints for save/fetch, add console logs for data confirmation
Add debug logging to backend/main.mo submitQuizResult function to log when quiz data is received and successfully stored, including the principal ID and quiz result details
Add debug logging to backend/main.mo getAllUserProfiles function to log the number of profiles being returned and basic profile information
Verify that backend/main.mo submitQuizResult function correctly stores quiz results in the stable userProfiles HashMap and associates them with the caller's principal ID
Verify that backend/main.mo getAllUserProfiles function correctly retrieves all user profiles from the userProfiles HashMap including quiz results and returns them as an array

Add detailed documentation comment in backend/main.mo explaining that user data is stored in stable memory using Motoko stable variables (userProfiles HashMap) and persists across canister upgrades, clarifying there is no external JSON file database

Create a comprehensive README.md file in the project root with step-by-step instructions to: (1) install dfx and Node.js dependencies, (2) start the local Internet Computer replica with dfx start --clean, (3) deploy the backend canister with dfx deploy backend, (4) start the frontend development server with npm run dev, (5) access the application at localhost URLs, and (6) view backend logs with dfx canister logs backend
Analyze and fix compilation errors in backend/main.mo that are preventing successful deployment to the Internet Computer network
Verify that all Motoko type declarations in backend/main.mo are correct and compatible with the current Motoko compiler version
Ensure all imports in backend/main.mo use correct module paths and that all imported modules are available in the current Motoko base library
Validate that all HashMap operations in backend/main.mo use correct syntax for stable storage patterns compatible with the Motoko compiler
Fix any actor class or public function signature errors in backend/main.mo that may be causing deployment failures
Remove all hardcoded platform name references from codebase and update footer to '© 2026 CareerSphere. All Rights Reserved.'
Search frontend/src/index.css and frontend/index.css for any CSS comments or custom property names that reference 'CareerSphere' and remove or genericize them
Search backend/main.mo for any string literals, comments, or documentation that reference 'CareerSphere' and remove or genericize them
Analyze and fix all Motoko compilation errors in backend/main.mo that are preventing successful deployment to the Internet Computer production network
Verify all HashMap operations and stable storage patterns in backend/main.mo use correct syntax compatible with the Motoko compiler version
Ensure all module imports in backend/main.mo reference valid Motoko base library modules with correct paths
Deploy the fixed backend canister to Internet Computer production network and verify it receives a permanent canister ID
Update frontend/index.html document title tag to change from any 'career guide' reference to 'CareerSphere - Your Career Path Navigator'
Search and update frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx hero section to replace any 'career guide' text with 'CareerSphere' in the title and tagline
Search and update frontend/src/pages/About.tsx to replace any 'career guide' references with 'CareerSphere' in mission and vision statements
Search backend/main.mo for any string literals, comments, or documentation containing 'career guide' and replace with 'CareerSphere'
